alert.note: Alert for Eastern Black Range Foothills; Sierra County Lakes (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 7:36PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Sierra County through 800 PM MDT... At 735 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles north of City of Elephant Butte, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rock House, North Monticello Point, Elephant Butte Lake, Lost Canyon, Lakeshore Highlands, and South Monticello Campground. This includes Interstate 25 in New Mexico between mile markers 90 and 92. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Black Range Foothills; Sierra County Lakes
